divs: Sighting DetailsWell i was sitting in my room and all those rascals went to lunch in the lunch room. i was happy to get my break but it felt like there was a presance in the room. something weird was in the air and i could sence it. im a teacher so i decided to go grade papers on the computer. all of the sudden a flash of light and a bunch of smoke came out of my t.v. I decided to run out of the room and right before i did i saw that it was looking at the childrens names on the computer so i had to save there identity from "them". they could have been aprehended in lunch but i saved there life. i just want to have a crew come down to Medford and check out my room i havent touched it yet and they thrashed it and lefted this gew everywhere. some of the kids saw it to and were instantly killed. i called the police and they didnt listen to me. PLEASE HELP MUFON!
Summary: It came out of my T.V. and was amazing
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around May 25th 2007
